goal.en: The MBA program is a research degree. Thus, an objective of this course is to help equip students with the basics to read and conduct research in real estate finance and investments and related topics. The lecturer(s) will also cover a portion of essential topics in real estate finance investments such as the mortgage loans, management of income producing properties and the alternative real estate financing and investment vehicles.

content.en:
The theory and practice of real estate finance and investments with an emphasis on property valuation and various management issues facing REITs (real estate investment trusts). This course also examines the topic of real options which builds on material covered in “Futures and Options”, i.e., the application of binomial models.
Note: This course will be taught in English.“

textbook.en: “Text: 1. Real Estate Finance and Investments, by William B. Brueggeman and Jeffrey D. Fisher, 17th Ed, McGraw- Hill Irwin: 2022. 2. Journal papers, mainly the ones published in the Real Estate Economics. Reference: 不動產投資管理, 林左裕, 智勝書局.“
